text: Ba jod ored ej mū'minon, on goh ki az duşmanaton ʙa har sū megurexted va ʙa heç kase nigoh namekarded va Pajomʙar az puşt, şumoro sado mezad, ki nazdi man oed ej ʙandagoni Alloh, ammo ʙa ū çavoʙ nadoded. Pas Alloh şumoro dar muqoʙili koraton çazo dod. Ja'ne, ƣame ʙar ƣamaton afzud, ƣame ʙa saʙaʙi az dast dodani pirūzī va ƣanimat va ƣame ʙa saʙaʙi şikast xūrdanaton va ƣami digar, ki hamai ƣamhoro az jodi şumo ʙarad; (va on, in ʙud, ki xaʙari ʙardurūƣi kuşta şudani Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallamro şunided.) Va Alloh ʙa on cī mekuned, ogoh ast
